description:
cmd/vet: %b is a valid floating-point format.
Also add a report about "invalid type" from gotype, if -v is set.

messages.text:

Also add a report about "invalid type" from gotype, if -v is set.

subject: code review 7420045: cmd/vet: %b is a valid floating-point format.
